sentences.en: a broadcast on the evening news
sentences.cn: 晚间新闻广播

sentences.en: After a long evening of partying he looked tired.
sentences.cn: 纵情狂欢了一夜后，他看起来累了。

sentences.en: By the end of the evening they were all absolutely paralytic.
sentences.cn: 晚上结束时，他们全都酩酊大醉。

sentences.en: During the evening rush hour it was often solid with vehicles.
sentences.cn: 在交通的晚高峰时段，这里通常被车辆堵得水泄不通。

sentences.en: He had not expected the young man to reappear before evening.
sentences.cn: 他没想到这位年轻男子会在黄昏前再次出现。

sentences.en: He had very kindly asked me to the cocktail party that evening.
sentences.cn: 他很客气地邀请我参加那晚的鸡尾酒会。

sentences.en: I do most of my studying in the evening.
sentences.cn: 我学习大都在晚上。

sentences.en: I should be happy if you would bring them this evening.
sentences.cn: 如果今晚你将他们带来的话，我会很高兴。

sentences.en: I’ll see you this evening.
sentences.cn: 我今晚和你见面。

sentences.en: I’m usually out on Friday evenings.
sentences.cn: 周五晚上我通常都不在家。

sentences.en: In the evening a log fire would provide cosiness.
sentences.cn: 晚上点起篝火会让人感到温暖舒适。

sentences.en: It carried off the Evening Standard drama award for best play.
sentences.cn: 它获得伦敦晚间标准戏剧奖的最佳戏剧奖。

sentences.en: It was early evening by the time we got home.
sentences.cn: 我们到家时已经是傍晚了。

sentences.en: It was just gone 7 o'clock this evening when I finished.
sentences.cn: 今晚我做完的时候刚过7点。

sentences.en: It's been a beautiful evening and you have made it all possible.
sentences.cn: 那是个美好的夜晚，你让一切成为可能。

sentences.en: Later in the evening, Lewis began to croon another Springsteen song.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上晚些时候，刘易斯开始哼唱另一首斯普林斯汀的歌曲。

sentences.en: Peter left yesterday evening.
sentences.cn: 彼得昨天晚上走了。

sentences.en: She remembered that she was going to the social club that evening.
sentences.cn: 她记起来那晚她正要去社交俱乐部。

sentences.en: The evening show was terrible, with hesitant unsure performances from all.
sentences.cn: 晚上的演出很糟，所有人都缩手缩脚，显得很不自信。

sentences.en: The London Evening Standard moved offices a few years ago.
sentences.cn: 《伦敦标准晚报》报址几年前迁走了。

sentences.en: The most pleasurable experience of the evening was the wonderful fireworks display.
sentences.cn: 这个晚上最让人高兴的就是精彩的焰火表演。

sentences.en: We had just finished our evening meal when the doorbell rang.
sentences.cn: 我们刚吃完晚饭门铃就响了。

sentences.en: What are you doing tomorrow evening?
sentences.cn: 明天晚上你打算做什么？

words.tran_cn: [数] 偶数的；平坦的；相等的
前夕；傍晚；重大事件关头
变平；变得可比较；成为相等

trans.tran_cn: 在晚上的；为晚上的；晚上用的

trans.tran_en: the early part of the night between the end of the day and the time you go to bed
the early part of the night between the end of the day and the time you go to bed
the early part of the night between the end of the day and the time you go to bed
